hero.subtitle: Professional website that doesn't just look good – increases conversions, improves user experience and represents a profitable investment. With modern technologies, fast loading and mobile-friendly design.

about.heading: What I offer to clients?
about.description:
I don't just create websites – I solve business problems with digital solutions. Every project aims to deliver concrete results for your business.

What you get from me:
• Fast, mobile-friendly website that works perfectly on every device
• SEO-friendly code that improves Google rankings
• Modern, user-friendly interface that increases conversions
• Structured, maintainable code that serves well long-term
• Continuous technical support and development opportunities

I'm not just a technical expert – I'm a partner in business success. Every line of code creates value, and every project aims to deliver measurable results.

career_about.heading: Professional Profile
career_about.description:
As a junior frontend developer, I have 2+ years of project-based experience acquired through structured learning and real tasks. I completed 50+ hours of interactive training and 80+ practical exercises through the Scrimba Front-End Developer career path.

My professional strengths:
• Deep knowledge of modern web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, ES6+ JavaScript)
• Responsive design and mobile-friendly development
• UI/UX principles and user experience optimization
• Writing structured, maintainable code
• Using Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS frameworks
• Laravel basics and understanding backend communication

I learned every technology through projects, so I have not only theoretical knowledge but also practical skills. I started learning React in 2025, which opens new professional opportunities.

My continuous self-improvement drive and adaptive learning ability allow me to quickly adapt to new technologies and challenges.

title: Junior
frontend
developer
hero.subtitle: Modern web technologies, project-based learning and structured development. Continuous self-improvement with professional results.

2023.title: Web Technology Fundamentals
2023.desc: Learning HTML5 and CSS3, semantic markup and modern CSS techniques. Starting the Scrimba Front-End Developer career path with structured learning methods.

2023-2.title: JavaScript and Interactivity
2023-2.desc: ES6+ syntax, DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming (fetch, async/await). Practical projects: Blackjack game, Chrome extension, interactive components.

2023-3.title: UI/UX and Responsive Design
2023-3.desc: Flexbox, CSS Grid, mobile-first design. Complex layouts and visual hierarchy creation. Bootstrap framework mastery.

2024.title: Client Projects and Specialization
2024.desc: Completing real client commissions, understanding business needs. Learning Laravel basics. Mastering Firebase and modern CSS frameworks.

2024-ongoing.title: Continuous Growth and React
2024-ongoing.desc: Active client projects, expanding professional experience. React learning started in 2025 through the Scrimba course. Tailwind CSS, progressive web applications.

courses.heading: Structured Learning Path
courses.intro: The Scrimba Front-End Developer career path is a 70+ hour interactive, project-based learning program that teaches every skill through real tasks.

basic.title: 1. Basic Level – Web Dev Basics & CSS
basic.desc: HTML5 semantic elements, CSS3 basics and box model, responsive mobile-first thinking, Flexbox and CSS Grid introduction.

intermediate.title: 2. Intermediate – Interactive JavaScript
intermediate.desc: Modern ES6+ syntax, DOM manipulation, asynchronous operations (fetch, async/await), Promise handling.

advanced.title: 3. Advanced – UI Design & Advanced Layouts
advanced.desc: UI Design principles (white space, contrast, typography), complex Grid and Flexbox layouts, Tailwind CSS.

react.title: 4. React & Modern Development (started 2025)
react.desc: React learning started in 2025 through the Scrimba course. Basics of functional components, introduction to hooks (useState, useEffect).

frontend.heading: Frontend Technologies
frontend.desc: Modern web development tools and technologies

backend.heading: Backend Knowledge
backend.desc: Laravel and PHP basics, API communication

tools.heading: Development Tools
tools.desc: Version control, deployment and development environment

learningProjects.heading: Learning Projects
learningProjects.intro: Projects created during Scrimba courses and self-practice - stepping stones of development.

professionalProjects.intro: Client works that serve real business needs.

contact.heading: Let's discuss the project
contact.intro: Have an idea or want to start a website? Write to me, and together we'll create the digital solution that increases your business results.
contact.phoneNote: Available on weekdays between 9:00 AM and 6:00 PM.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about the project and your ideas…

careerContact.heading: Professional Contact
careerContact.intro: Looking for a junior frontend developer for your team? With 2+ years of project-based experience and modern web technology knowledge, I'd be happy to contribute to your company's digital goals. Let's discuss the details!
careerContact.phoneNote: Available on weekdays between 9:00 AM and 6:00 PM.
careerContact.messagePlaceholder: What position are you looking to fill? Tell me about the project and expectations…

fullSite.title: Complete Website Development
fullSite.desc: Modern, responsive websites that increase conversions and improve user experience. SEO-friendly code and fast loading.

frontendDev.title: Frontend Development

responsive.title: Mobile-Friendly Design
responsive.desc: Website that works perfectly on every device. Mobile-first design, fast loading and user-friendly navigation.

structuredCode.title: Structured Code
structuredCode.desc: Clean, documented and reusable code. Long-term maintainability and easy development opportunities.

animations.title: Animations and Interactions
animations.desc: Subtle, performance-optimized animations that improve user experience and increase conversions.

support.title: Technical Support
support.desc: Continuous technical support, bug fixes, updates and development opportunities even after the project.

githubCta.text: Want to see more of my coding skills?

step1.title: Consultation
step1.desc: We discuss business goals, target audience and expected results. Every project is tailored to business needs.

step2.title: Planning
step2.desc: UX/UI design, user experience optimization and technical architecture development. Prototype and wireframe creation.

step3.title: Development
step3.desc: With modern technologies, optimized code and responsive design. Testing and quality assurance at every step.

step4.title: Delivery and Support
step4.desc: With complete documentation, training and continuous technical support. Long-term partnership for business success.
